author: adityapatwardhan
body:
To use the pre-release version of .NET 5 RTM builds a workaround had to be added to build.psm1

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/201f4a6b78f9480589bc29cac91b140d1a5583cf/build.psm1#L1775-L1778

Please remove this when .NET 5 is released.

Also,

remove the RTM feed from the nuget.config:

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/f03952fc3c6e56aad4ebf5636178b1a5c7481fa8/nuget.config#L5

## Steps to reproduce

```powershell

```

## Expected behavior

```none

```

## Actual behavior

```none

```

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none

```

comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #14038, which has now been successfully released as `v7.2.0-preview.1`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.2.0-preview.1)

title: Remove workaround for use pre-release of .NET 5 RTM build
